item.description:
POST /api/v1/evaluate
Candidate evaluation only (no interviewer assessment)

Request requires:
- jobDescription (required)
- interviewTranscript (required)
- seniority (required): 'junior', 'mid', or 'senior'

Response includes:
- Overall score (0-100)
- Verdict: 'borderline', 'hire', 'strong_hire'
- Skills evaluation with proficiency scores
- Communication and problem-solving scores
- Strengths and weaknesses
- Summary and evaluation timestamp

item.name: Full Evaluation - POST /api/v1/evaluate/full

exec: pm.test('Interviewer evaluation has required fields', function () {

request.description:
Full evaluation with interviewer assessment

Request:
- jobDescription (required)
- interviewTranscript (required)
- seniority (required): 'junior', 'mid', or 'senior'
- evaluateInterviewer: true

Response includes:
1. Candidate evaluation (same as /api/v1/evaluate)
2. Interviewer evaluation with:
   - Overall score (0-10)
   - Question quality (0-10)
   - Communication clarity (0-10)
   - Bias risk assessment (low/medium/high)
   - Strengths and improvement areas

Full evaluation WITHOUT interviewer assessment
When evaluateInterviewer=false, interviewerEvaluation is null in response

item.description:
POST /api/v1/evaluate/full
Candidate + Optional interviewer evaluation

Request:
- jobDescription (required)
- interviewTranscript (required)
- seniority (required): 'junior', 'mid', or 'senior'
- evaluateInterviewer (optional, default false): true|false

Response:
- candidateEvaluation (always present)
- interviewerEvaluation (null if evaluateInterviewer=false)
- evaluatedAt timestamp

item.description:
Test error handling and validation

Validation Rules:
- jobDescription: required, must not be blank
- interviewTranscript: required, must not be blank
- seniority: required, must be 'junior', 'mid', or 'senior'
- evaluateInterviewer: optional boolean (default false)

Error Response Format:
{
  "status": "error",
  "message": "descriptive error message",
  "timestamp": "ISO-8601 timestamp"
}
